Hi Jamie,

Sure, we added some css fix code to this page : https://annualreport2018.nesa.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=822&action=edit
Apparently there is a overlapping issue with the css.

Let me know if this is ok?

Hi Heath or Joel,

Do you guys have any idea on how to resolve an issue I'm facing with the Slick Menu on the Nesa AR website?

When the menu is active the background under the menu overlay is doing strange things. It varies depending on where you are on on the page - See attached.




Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative



// M 0423 592 912

Hi Jamie,

Sure, we have added some css fixed for this one. This fixed overrides the adaptive height but we vertically centered the content.

Let me know if this is ok?
https://annualreport2018.nesa.com.au/support/

Hi Joel,

One problem we're having with the quote carousel that you helped with is the adaptive height on change. When the quote is out of the users sight it's pushing the content up and down making it difficult to focus on.

Are you able to write a script that pause the carousel when out of sight?


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative



// M 0423 592 912

Hi Jamie, 

We would love to help you out today, but are also under some pressure with some firm deadlines.

The best we could do would be to jump in around Friday morning... Is that a possibility? We have more sites than days to code at the moment haha. #Christmas!

Hi Heath and Joel,

How are you guys placed to have a look a few cross browser issues today?

I had a quick check last night and there's a couple of rendering issues on internet explorer 9 and 10.

I'm not sure what tools you have for testing but I was running the built in emulator in internet explorer, although I'm not sure how accurate that is.

Let me know as soon as you can.

Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

Hi Jamie,

All good now. We have changed it to " - " instead of "-".
https://annualreport2018.nesa.com.au/vision/

Hi Joel,

Can you please update this script so it ignores hyphenated words?

I believe its being applied to a tile labelled "Long-term Unemployed" on the Vision page.



Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative



// M 0423 592 912

Hi Jamie,

Please see below

For the top banner of each main page - GENERAL (B11):
- currently targeting the arrows class (.arrows-container) when clicked

Styling/formatting of all testimonials - GENERAL (B12):
- Have a look at this page. https://annualreport2018.nesa.com.au/support/
- We have setup a css to target this quote class ".nesa-quote-block .quote-carousel"
- Turn on the "Adaptive Height" under Quote Shortcode Advance > Adaptive Height

Ecosystem - ABOUT (B16)
- Waiting on the indesign files to polish it. 

CEO modal close button- ABOUT
- We just add a margin 90 top and bottom. 

We Represented the Sector before five Government Inquiry Committees section - VOICE(B6):
- We added some CSS for this one. ".nesa-no-icon". You can use this class to remove the dots.

Recognizing Excellence Section - VOICE (B7):
- We have added a script that targets the character  " - " with the parent class of ".vc-hoverbox-front-inner" : 
From: "ACHIEVER OF THE YEAR - SUPPORTED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF JOBS AND SMALL BUSINESS"
TO : "ACHIEVER OF THE YEAR <small>SUPPORTED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF JOBS AND SMALL BUSINESS</small>"

Webinars Match height script, reference - SUPPORT (B11):
- Watch this video. https://www.useloom.com/share/81da449ea7b04cd192e9113feffd50e3

CSS
https://annualreport2018.nesa.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=822&action=edit

JS 
https://annualreport2018.nesa.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=821&action=edit

Let me know if this is ok?

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

I've had a chat with Heath and he says you'll be able to help with a few development tasks on https://annualreport2018.nesa.com.au/.

Thanks so much in advance. I really appreciate it.

There's 5 key pages that need work, which is detailed in the spreadsheet (linked below) There's a tab for each webpage plus a general tab. I've assigned you and Heath to the things I need help with.

I have a less build that is generating the a css file, so to avoid cross over you can either add css to the child themes primary stylesheet (which is empty) or as Heath mentioned install a editor plugin to override. I'll merge your changes into my less build at a later date.

I hope everything is self explanatory. If you can update the status in the spreadsheet to let me know it's been looked at that would be awesome.

Lastly, if you have any more time this evening, it would be great if you could look at some of the text changes detailed under the Text Changes task type. They are currently assigned to Spiro or myself I've attached the word document that includes some of the text changes.

Here's the spreadsheet link:https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1CFcSvUer2qBFo2LbvVKMNg_LJx6n0pIk9SvkDWmoKbo/edit?usp=sharing

Thanks again! Please email me if you have any questions.

Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// A Level 1, 616 Balcombe Road, Black Rock, 3193 VIC
